maqras.text: My nadaly pravo David z blahoslovennyam z nas: "O hory, pidkoryayutʹsya z nym, ta vy takozh, O ptakhy." My pom'yakshyly zalizo dlya nʹoho
Vy mozhete zrobyty shchyty shcho prydatni doskonalo, ta robota righteousness. Shchob ni vy, ya Seer tut

Solomon my zdiysnyly viter u yoho rozporyadzhenni, mandruyuchy odyn misyatsʹ prybuttya ta odyn misyatsʹ iduchyy. Ta my vyklykaly beremo pochatok z naftu khlynuty dlya nʹoho. Takozh, jinns popratsyuvav dlya nʹoho, yoho vid'yizdom Lorda. Budʹ-yakyy odyn z nykh khto disregarded nashi komandy, my piddaly yoho do suvoroho retribution

Vony spryamuvaly do yoho budʹ shcho vin zakhotiv - nishi, statuyi, hlyboki stavky, ta vazhki varyachi horshchyky. O rodyna David, robota (righteousness) shchob pokazaty vashu otsinku. Tilʹky dekilʹka Moyikh sluzhbovtsiv appreciative

Koly pryznachenyy chas dlya yoho smerti prybuv, vony ne maly klyucha shcho vin vmer. Ne do odniyeyi z tvaryn postaravsya z'yisty yoho personal, ta vin vypav, jinns zdiysnyv shcho vin buv mertvyy. Vony takym chynom zdiysnyly, kotryy yakshcho b vony diysno znaly unseen, vony zupynyatʹsya robochi takym chynom tyazhkyy yak tilʹky vin vmer
Sheba batʹkivshchyna zvychayno bula dyvo, z dvoma parkom na pravi ta lyshenomu. Z'yizhte z vashykh umov Lorda, ta vmiyutʹ appreciative Yoho harnoyi zemli, ta probachayuchoyi Lordu
Vony prohnaly ta, otzhe, my lylysya na nykh z·hubnyy potik, ta my zaminyly yikhniy dva park u dva park pohanykh kushtuyuchykh fruktiv, thorny zavodiv, ta skimpy urozhayu
My takym chynom requited yim dlya yikhnʹoho disbelief. My ne requite tilʹky disbelievers
My rozmistyly mizh nymy ta spilʹnotamy shcho my blahoslovlyaly inshi oazysy, ta my zabezpechyly mandrivku mizh nymy: "Peresuvannya tam dni ta nich u povnotsinniy bezpetsi

Ale vony (povernuly unappreciative ta) kydav vyklyk: "Nash Lord, my ne dbayemo yakshcho Vy zbilʹshuyete vidstanʹ nashykh mandrivok (bez budʹ-yakykh stantsiy)." Vony takym chynom obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi. Otzhe, my zrobyly yim istoriyu, ta rozihnaly yikh u mali spilʹnoty vsyudy zemlya. Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty uroky dlya tsykh khto steadfast, appreciative
Satan znaydeni yim lehko vykonuyuchi yoho ochikuvannya. Vony proslidkuvaly za yo, krim nechyslennykh viruyuchiv
Vin nikoly ne mav budʹ-yakyy enerhetychnyy nad nymy. Ale my takym chynom rozriznyuyemo tsi khto viryatʹ v U maybutnʹomu z tsykh khto ye doubtful pro tse. Vash Lord ye u povnomu kontroli vsikh rechey

Kazhete, "Blahayete idoliv vy vstanovyly bilya BOHA. Vony ne volodiyutʹ yak bahato yak yedynoho atomu u nebi, abo zemli. Vony ne volodiyutʹ partnerstvom tam, ne Vin dozvolyayutʹ yim buty Yoho asystenty

Zastupnytstvo z Nym bude marno, yakshcho ne tse zbihayetʹsya z Yoho bude. Koly yikhni rozum nareshti zaspokoyuyutʹsya, ta vony zapytuyutʹ, "Shcho zrobyly vashoho Lorda kazhutʹ," vony skazhutʹ, pravda." Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysoko, naybilʹsh Velykyy
